DOC.brief_summary: This study compare two different formulation vabicaserin .
DOC.criteria: Sexually active men must agree use medically acceptable form contraception study continue 12 week investigational product administration . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history . Must able abstain smoking inpatient stay . Use investigational prescription drug within 30 day investigation product administration . Consumption caffeinecontaining product ( eg , coffee , tea , chocolate , soda ) alcoholic beverage within 48 hour study day 1 . Use overthecounter drug , include herbal supplement within 72 hour study day 1 .
